text: Allāhtāṉ uṅkaḷai (ārampattil) maṇṇāl uṟpatti ceytāṉ. Piṉṉar, oru tuḷi intiriyattiliruntu (paṭaittāṉ). Piṉṉar, (āṇ, peṇ jōṭi) jōṭiyāka uṅkaḷai ākkiṉāṉ. Avaṉ aṟiyāmal oru peṇ karppamāvatum illai; piracavippatum illai. Avaṉuṭaiya ‘lavhul mahḥpūḷil' illāmal evaṉuṭaiya vayatum atikarippatumillai; kuṟaintu viṭuvatum illai. Niccayamāka i(vai aṉaittaiyum aṟintiruppa)tu allāhvukkuc culapamāṉatē
